import React from "react" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { removeProduct } from '../../redux/basket/basketSlice' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { routes } from '../../App' import './BasketPage.scss' import { setIsAuth } from "../../redux/user/userSlice" function BasketPage() { const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { basketList, sum } = useSelector(state => state.basket) const handleClick = (card) => { dispatch(removeProduct(card)) } const logOut = () => { dispatch(setIsAuth(false)) localStorage.removeItem('login') localStorage.removeItem('password') navigate(routes.login) } const { url, description, title, price, weight, quantity, id } = card const handleCard = () => { const item = { id: id, idx: uuidv4(), url: url, price: price, description: description, weight: weight, quantity: quantity } navigate('/goods' + '/' + id) } return (

Корзина с выбранными товарами

{/* */}
{basketList.length > 0 ?
    {basketList.map((x, index) =>

  • {x.title}

    {x.price} ₽
    • ) }
:
Корзина пуста
}

Заказ на сумму: {sum} ₽

) } export default BasketPage;
